text: Hello <@U0695UMTM2M>, appreciate your insights! We successfully migrated using <http://Datawarehouse.io|Datawarehouse.io>, and the process was smooth. However, we're currently exploring a long-term solution for HubSpot to HubSpot sync of company records. I'll explore Supered as you suggested. Initially, we were considering HubSpot webhooks/private app, but it seems it might not be a feasible solution.

So this is actually the exact way I would do it. I don't think you even really need a web hook just hit the api endpoint for the other environment to update the record from a custom coded action. If you want to look at it further I would love to! This is an interesting problem.
Do contacts need to make it over? Is it 1 way or 2 way? Etc.

Hi Everyone! I am looking to get some help with a very simple (yet complex) logic problem I am having. I am trying to automate copy property values to the (Newest Deal) but HubSpot allows “All deals” meaning my data would go to deals that should not have that data. Any suggestions here? Thanks in advance!
